name: Xcode 26.3
description: Apple's major IDE update that integrates AI agents directly into Xcode, including Anthropic's Claude Agent and OpenAI's Codex for agentic coding capabilities.
community_quotes: Unlocks the power of agentic coding
Integrates Claude Agent and Codex directly
Major update for Apple's development environment
Released as Release Candidate on February 3, 2026

name: OpenAI Codex Desktop App
description: A standalone macOS desktop application for OpenAI's Codex AI coding agent, allowing developers to run multiple AI coding agents simultaneously from their desktop.
community_quotes: Lets developers run multiple AI coding agents simultaneously
Part of OpenAI's expanded efforts in AI coding space

name: OpenCode
description: An open-source AI coding agent with native terminal-based UI, multi-session support, and compatibility with 75+ models, with over 60,000 GitHub stars.
community_quotes: Currently the top AI coding agent

name: Snowflake Cortex Code
description: An AI coding agent purpose-built for the enterprise data stack that understands enterprise data context to help developers code more productively with Snowflake data.
community_quotes: Announced at Snowflake Summit in London

name: OpenAI GPT-5.3-Codex
description: Evolved from a focus on being 'the best coding agent' to a general computer collaborator with enhanced agentic capabilities; OpenAI's new coding model that helped build and deploy itself.
community_quotes: Evolved from best coding agent to general computer collaborator
Model helped build and deploy itself

name: VS Code Multi-Agent Development
description: Announced February 5, 2026, VS Code becomes the first major AI code editor with full MCP Apps support for multi-agent development.
community_quotes: First major AI code editor with full MCP Apps support

name: CreateOS
description: A platform to build and deploy apps from any AI coding tool in one place, achieving a Product Hunt score of 533 in February 2026.
community_quotes: Build and deploy apps from any AI coding tool

name: Devlop Ai
description: An agentic IDE designed to take developers from prototype to production, specifically for embedded systems and STM32 firmware development.
community_quotes: Takes developers from prototype to production

name: Qwen3-Coder-Next
description: An open-weight language model released February 2, 2026, designed specifically for coding agents and local development.

name: Vibe Pocket
description: A tool that enables developers to run CLI-based AI agents like Claude Code, Codex, Gemini CLI, and OpenCode from any device by connecting their GitHub repository.
community_quotes: Run CLI AI agents from anywhere

name: SessionCast CLI
description: A CLI tool that provides remote monitoring and control capabilities for Claude Code sessions, enabling developers to work with Claude Code from anywhere.
community_quotes: Enables remote workflow with Claude Code

name: Sweep for JetBrains
description: A world-class AI coding agent and autocomplete with next-edit capabilities, built specifically for JetBrains IDEs and available on the JetBrains Marketplace.
community_quotes: World-class AI coding agent and autocomplete

name: Mistral AI Vibe 2.0
description: A terminal-based coding agent powered by the Devstral 2 model, providing CLI-based AI development assistance.

name: ACP Agent Registry
description: A directory of AI coding agents integrated into JetBrains IDEs, created in partnership with Zed, making it easier for developers to discover and use AI coding agents.
community_quotes: Directory for discovering AI coding agents
